row.process:
! We escape characters based on Platform for java Strings
! Removes empty spaces at the beginning and the end of a string : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#)
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "\", "\\") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "$", "\$") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "`", "\`")
! Escape double-quotes : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"')
! then we add double-quotes to String to preserve spaces in value : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT('"', &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#) : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"')
